title: 266 - Ryan LeCompte & Matt Simpson (VET)
description:
Ryan and Matt (Veterans for Entheogenic Treatment) are working to bring ayahuasca-assisted therapy to veterans suffering from treatment-resistant PTSD. 



This is a public episode. If you’d like to discuss this with other subscribers or get access to bonus episodes, visit chrisryan.substack.com/subscribe
dc:creator: Chris Ryan
itunes:author: Chris Ryan
